main event: A witness observed a bright, oblong white object that was stationary for 1-2 minutes and then moved away at high speed in the southwest direction.
interesting points: The object moved behind and in front of clouds during the observation.
The witness estimated the object's altitude to be between 1300-1800 feet when overhead.
The witness stated they could not determine what the object was, and had contacted various authorities but no one could identify it.
The witness had their twin daughters with them at the time of the sighting.
The witness described the object as having lost the appearance of a passenger plane.
witnesses: the witness and their twin daughters
